title: 24 Whisker Wrapped Memes Fur Your Wholesome Feline Funny Fix
description: No matter what kind of hooman you are, we all need our feline fix. For some it is a feisty feline fix, for others a fluffy, but no matter what we all need it and need it regularly. It is the principle reason that dog pawrents are so anti-cat, because they are jealous that they cannot cheat on their canine children and get their feline fix. But you, dear hooman, are lucky enough not to be limited by a pawdorable pupper and are free to fill your soul with sweet cats whenever you want.At least we are assuming that, seeing as you are here. So we welcome you to today's feline fix, which is a wholesome and funny one that comes wrapped in the most whimsical of wrappers, whiskers. And if these felines are not enough for your fix, then check out these cute cattos to round out your feline fixation.
author: Laurent Shinar
excerpt: 24 Whisker Wrapped Memes Fur Your Wholesome Feline Funny Fix - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals
text: There is nothing more simultaneously terrifying and hilarious that waking up a group of sleeping cats. Especially when they turn to look at you together with a range of emotions. From bottom to top you’ve got angrier than the time you stepped their food, shocked as though a firework went off, apathy, and pure hatred, just hatred. Freaking knew it! These are the true cat burglars. They evolved to be able to seamlessly fit into black tie events, where they hold the most expensive auctions. And then once they have skipped past all the security, they get to work. They truly are tiny evil geniuses.
html:
There is nothing more simultaneously terrifying and hilarious that waking up a group of sleeping cats. Especially when they turn to look at you together with a range of emotions. From bottom to top you’ve got angrier than the time you stepped their food, shocked as though a firework went off, apathy, and pure hatred, just hatred.

Freaking knew it! These are the true cat burglars. They evolved to be able to seamlessly fit into black tie events, where they hold the most expensive auctions. And then once they have skipped past all the security, they get to work. They truly are tiny evil geniuses.
